content.html: The last 3 months, we have seen trans people: - referred to as pedophiles/groomers - called "an infection" - "need to be morally mandated out of existence" Parents of trans people are investigated. Health care may be pulled. The eugenics/genocide language is turned up to 11.
content.value:
The last 3 months, we have seen trans people:

- referred to as pedophiles/groomers
- called "an infection"
- "need to be morally mandated out of existence"

Parents of trans people are investigated. Health care may be pulled.

The eugenics/genocide language is turned up to 11.
